Class to represent all existing quizzes as a list of quizzes Contains fields for: quizzes Contains methods for: - Method to add a quiz to the list of quizArrayList - Method to return an optional quiz object with a quizName that matches an inputted string - Method to update an existing quiz in the database with a new quiz object to override - Method to delete a quiz from the database - Method to clear all quizzes from the database
